segments.source_content: We are happy to announce **Docusaurus 3.4**.

translations.zh-hant: 我們很高興宣布 **Docusaurus 3.4** 正式發布。

segments.source_content: Upgrading should be easy. Our [release process](/community/release-process) respects [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/). Minor versions do not include any breaking changes.

translations.zh-hant: 升級過程應該很簡單。我們的[發布流程](/community/release-process)遵循[語意化版本控制](https://semver.org/)。次要版本更新不會包含任何破壞性變更。

segments.source_content: ## Highlights

translations.zh-hant: ## 重點更新

segments.source_content: ### Tags files

translations.zh-hant: ### 標籤檔案

segments.source_content: The docs and blog plugins both already supported a `tags` front matter attribute, enabling you to group related content. But tags declared inline in the front matter are not always ideal.

translations.zh-hant: 文件與部落格插件原本就支援在 front matter 中使用 `tags` 屬性來分類相關內容。但直接在 front matter 中宣告標籤並非總是理想的做法。

segments.source_content: With [#10137](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10137), you can now declare a list of pre-defined tags in a `tags.yml` file:

translations.zh-hant: 透過 [#10137](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10137)，您現在可以在 `tags.yml` 檔案中預先定義標籤列表：

segments.source_content:
```yml title="blog/tags.yml"
tag1:
  label: 'Tag 1'
  description: 'Tag 1 description'
  permalink: /tag-1-permalink

tag2:
  label: 'Tag 2'
  description: 'Tag 2 description'
  permalink: /tag-2-permalink
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3569d545

segments.source_content: These predefined tags can be used in the front matter of your blog or docs files:

translations.zh-hant: 這些預定義標籤可用於部落格或文件檔案的 front matter 中：

segments.source_content:
```md title="blog/2024-05-31-my-blog-post.md"
---
tags: [tag1, tag2]
---

# Title

Content
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_de8f60af

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Keeping tags usage consistent]

Use the new `onInlineTags: 'throw'` plugin option to enforce the usage of predefined tags and prevent contributors from creating new unwanted tags.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[保持標籤使用一致性]

使用新的 `onInlineTags: 'throw'` 插件選項來強制使用預定義標籤，防止貢獻者創建新的非預期標籤。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Hash Router - Experimental

translations.zh-hant: ### 哈希路由 - 實驗性功能

segments.source_content: With [9859](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9859), we added a new **experimental** hash router config option, useful for **offline browsing** by opening your site locally through the `file://` protocol.

translations.zh-hant: 透過 [9859](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9859)，我們新增了一個**實驗性**的哈希路由配置選項，這對於透過 `file://` 協議在本機開啟網站進行**離線瀏覽**非常有用。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_6d254e09

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This mode is **not recommended for sites deployed through a web server**.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

**不建議**將此模式用於透過網頁伺服器部署的站點。

:::

segments.source_content: When this mode is turned on, Docusaurus will opt out of static site rendering, and build a client-side single page application where all routes are prefixed with `/#/`. A single `index.html` file is generated. This file can be opened locally in your browser by simply clicking it, using the browser `file://` protocol. This makes it possible to distribute a Docusaurus site as a `.zip` file so that readers can browse it offline, without having to install anything complex on their computer apart a web browser.

translations.zh-hant: 啟用此模式後，Docusaurus 將退出靜態網站渲染，轉而構建一個客戶端單頁應用程式，其中所有路由都會加上 `/#/` 前綴。系統會生成單一的 `index.html` 檔案，使用者只需點擊該檔案即可透過瀏覽器的 `file://` 協議在本機開啟。這使得將 Docusaurus 站點打包成 `.zip` 檔案分發成為可能，讀者無需在電腦上安裝複雜的軟體，僅需使用網頁瀏覽器即可離線瀏覽內容。

此功能目前處於**實驗階段**。如果您試用了此功能，請[在此處](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3825)告訴我們您的使用體驗。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Site Storage - Experimental

translations.zh-hant: ### 站點儲存 - 實驗性功能

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses the browser `localStorage` API to persist UI state.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用瀏覽器的 `localStorage` API 來持久化 UI 狀態。

segments.source_content: But sometimes the storage space is "shared" between multiple sites using the same domain, leading to **storage key conflicts**. This generally happens in two cases

translations.zh-hant: 但有時儲存空間會被同一網域下的多個站點「共享」，導致**儲存鍵衝突**。這種情況通常發生在兩種情境：

segments.source_content:
- when working on multiple `http://localhost:3000` sites
- when hosting multiple sites under the same domain: `https://example.com/site1/` and `https://example.com/site2/`

translations.zh-hant:
- 同時開發多個 `http://localhost:3000` 站點時
- 同一網域下托管多個站點時：例如 `https://example.com/site1/` 和 `https://example.com/site2/`

segments.source_content: For this reason, we introduced a new **experimental** `siteStorage` configuration option:

translations.zh-hant: 為此，我們新增了一個**實驗性**的 `siteStorage` 配置選項：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_890e01bc

segments.source_content: When `namespace: true` is set, we apply a hash suffix to all the storage keys, making them unique to the current site (based on `config.url` and `config.baseUrl`. For example, the `theme` storage key becomes `theme-x6f`. It is also possible to provide your own custom suffix `namespace: 'suffix'`. We also made it possible to use `type: 'sessionStorage'` instead of the default `localStorage`.

translations.zh-hant: 當設置 `namespace: true` 時，我們會為所有儲存鍵添加哈希後綴，使其基於 `config.url` 和 `config.baseUrl` 成為當前站點專屬。例如，`theme` 儲存鍵會變成 `theme-x6f`。您也可以自定義後綴 `namespace: 'suffix'`。此外，我們也支援使用 `type: 'sessionStorage'` 來替代預設的 `localStorage`。

segments.source_content:
:::caution[Experimental]

This feature is **experimental**. If you try it out, please let us know how it works for you [here](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10121).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::caution[實驗性功能]

此功能目前處於**實驗階段**。若您嘗試使用，請於[此處](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10121)回報使用體驗。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Other changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 其他變更

segments.source_content: Other notable changes include:

translations.zh-hant: 其他值得注意的變更包括：

segments.source_content:
- [#10151](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10151): add Turkmen (tk) theme translations
- [#10111](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10111): add Bulgarian (bg) theme translations
- [#10168](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10168): fix many long overdue Markdown link resolution bugs
- [#10178](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10178): the `/search` page now respects the `contextualSearch: false` setting
- [#10118](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10118): fix bad pluralization on docs generated index category card description
- [#10130](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10130): fix false positives reported by the broken anchor checker due to trailing slashes

translations.zh-hant:
- [#10151](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10151): 新增土庫曼語 (tk) 主題翻譯
- [#10111](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10111): 新增保加利亞語 (bg) 主題翻譯  
- [#10168](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10168): 修復多個長期未解決的 Markdown 連結解析錯誤
- [#10178](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10178): `/search` 頁面現在會遵循 `contextualSearch: false` 設定
- [#10118](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10118): 修正文件生成索引分類卡描述中的錯誤複數形式
- [#10130](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10130): 修復因結尾斜線導致錨點檢查器誤報的問題
